text: 6.16 Kis 33.20, Jon 6.46, Plp 4.20, Jud 25 Ne nokom kumnɨmuŋ tek ma mɨdeb. Mɨlek tep ne ak ke yɨbɨl mɨdeb, binɨb jɨj sɨŋak amnɨgel tek ma lup. Bɨ olap nop ma yɨbɨl nɨgup, pen bɨ olap nop nɨgɨnɨmuŋ tek ma yɨbɨl lup. Anɨb ak tek, binɨb okok yɨb nop dad aplanɨgel, kɨles ne ak mɨdɨl kɨlop pel pelnep kod yonɨmuŋ. Yaw.
